import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function NavBar() { useEffect(() => { if(window.screen.availWidth < 650){ setHide(false) setHide1(true) } else{ setHide(true) setHide1(false) } },[]) return (
    About us
    Gallery
    Books
) } export default NavBar
